channel.title: Matrix 718 [ShopKeepers Stand Still]
channel.description:
Hello, all I am wondering how to do is make it so the shop keepers can not move, and stand still. I have no troubles making the shops or changing npc spawns. I am using the different NPC's for the shops, and they are constantly walking around and annoying me, I would like to make them stand still.
Correction: Can someone please give me an example for object spawns in Matrix 718, this is how it tells me to use it, and this is what I do, Can someone give me a working example please? (I haven't touched anything Runescape related in over a year)
